mapper.sql: IFNULL(b.name, '') nameOpDevice, IFNULL(c.location, '') locationOpDeviceCabinet, IFNULL(d.name, '') nameElectrician, IFNULL(e.name, '') nameStatusElectrician,

LEFT JOIN opDevice AS b ON b.id = a.idOpDevice LEFT JOIN opDeviceCabinet AS c ON c.id = b.idOpDeviceCabinet LEFT JOIN MaUser AS d ON d.id = a.idElectrician LEFT JOIN syStatusDetail e ON (e.codeSyStatus = 'ckzt' AND e.value = a.statusElectrician)
mapper.select: SELECT a.midOpWorkOrder, d.name, d.description, a.idChecker, a.nameChecker, a.listNameElectrician, c.location,a.idElectrician, a.dateSendOpCardPower,a.dateSendOpCardWork,b.name AS deviceName FROM opDeviceElectricianCard AS a LEFT JOIN opDevice AS b ON b.id = a.idOpDevice LEFT JOIN opDeviceCabinet AS c ON c.code = b.idOpDeviceCabinet LEFT JOIN opWorkOrder AS d ON d.id = a.midOpWorkOrder WHERE a.statusElectrician = #{statusElectrician} AND a.idMaCompany = #{idMaCompany} AND a.tag != 'd' AND a.tag = "n" AND a.idElectrician = #{idElectrician} ORDER BY a.createDate DESC
